altTitles.en: ミッドナイト・メイク・ラブ

description.en:
*Collection of stories:*  
  
*1. Sleeping forest Vampire*  
A bunch of vampires sleep in their coffins at one place in an enchanted forest. Alexander's sleep got disturbed by Miharu, who keeps getting into his coffin when he's drunk. What will become of the two of them tonight?  
  
*2.Help me, Alice!*  
Kazushi is sorting his things before going to university. Suddenly, he finds his favorite book "Alice in Wonderland" and falls asleep while reading it. He dreamt about the scenario from the book and meet the Rabbit, who proposes him something kids shouldn't read about.  
  
*3. Sasakawa-kun's lucky item*  
Sasakawa Yukinari, despite his name, keeps getting into dangerous accidents. Upon finding Fortune Club Card, he decides to take his future in his hands and follow the fortune teller's advice. But why do his lucky items must always be so embarrassing?  
  
*4. Fall from grace ~From the world you fell~*  
A member of popular idol group "Sirius" created a scandal. As punishment, he had to change schools and got Mishina-sensei as a watch dog. He still acts frivolously till sensei starts to pursue his own agenda. Can Akira win with sensei?  
  
*5. Kabukichou no Hanayome*  
A host named Touya got suddenly confessed to on the street with the words "Please, be my wife" by another man.  
  
*6. Sentimental High Heel*  
Yuzuki can't handle the noise his neighbor is making. He goes upstairs to confront him and finds that… his male neighbor is wearing high heels!?  
  
*7. Please look at me, Makihara-kun.*  
A sweet looking boy keeps pursuing a Yankee Makihara after a love session in the zoo.  
  
*8. Extra of Sleeping forest Vampire*
